H0.text: What was set at 3 groats per household in 1380 and caused social unrest. Head Tax

H1.text: What was set at 3 groats per household in 1380 and caused social unrest. Hearth Tax

H2.text: What was set at 3 groats per household in 1380 and caused social unrest. Tithe

H3.text: What was set at 3 groats per household in 1380 and caused social unrest. Polltax

A4.text: The minimum amount payable was set at 4d, however tax collectors had to account for a 12d a head mean assessment.

A5.text: and has been credited as one of the main reasons behind the Peasants' Revolt in that year.
